introduction.content: Hợp Phát Logistics Co., Ltd., founded in 2016, specializes in providing comprehensive logistics solutions, including international transportation, customs clearance, warehousing, and goods distribution. With the motto "Efficiency - Safety - Reliability", we are committed to delivering professional services, cost optimization, and meeting all customer transportation needs. With an experienced team and an extensive partner network, we take pride in being a reliable bridge that helps businesses expand their markets and enhance their competitiveness. Hợp Phát Logistics continuously improves its services and applies modern technology to ensure a safe, transparent, and convenient transportation process for our customers. Hợp Phát Logistics – Your trusted logistics solution!

ourServices.label: Our Services
ourServices.subLabel: We provide four types of transportation services to customers, along with related support services for the transportation process.

support.label: Support Services
support.content: Support services related to the transportation process.

address.label: Address
address.content: 585 Tung Thien Vuong, Ward 12, District 8, Ho Chi Minh City

subItems.address: 585 Tung Thien Vuong, Ward 12, District 8, Ho Chi Minh City

introduction.content: Hợp Phát Logistics (founded in 2016) provides comprehensive logistics solutions, including international transportation, customs clearance, and warehousing. We are committed to fast, accurate, and efficient services to help businesses expand and optimize their supply chains.

routes.label: Strong presence in Southeast Asia and China routes
routes.desc: We provide full-container load (FCL) and less-than-container load (LCL) shipping at competitive prices with door-to-door delivery services. Additionally, HPL handles shipments under various terms such as EXW, FOB, CIF, etc.

handling.label: Handling all customer requests and orders
handling.desc: With years of experience in domestic freight transportation, HPL can confidently meet all customer needs.

experience.label: Experienced legal team
experience.desc: Our legal team, trained at top law universities in Vietnam, is ready to handle the most complex import-export documents for our customers.

saveTime.label: Maximize time savings for customers
saveTime.desc: If customers lack time or experience, HPL's Entrusted Service will complete their orders with just a single authorization document.
